data.comment: The match has started at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 1, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
In the minute 4, Lorient needs to be cautious. Brestois have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Haris Belkebla is booked for the home team.
In the minute 5, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Karim Abed signals a Brestois throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 7, Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Brestois, close to Lorient's area.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Brestois.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Quentin Boisgard.
Quentin Boisgard is back on his feet again.
In the minute 10, Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lorient.
Brestois's Romain Faivre gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Karim Abed waits before resuming play because Quentin Boisgard for Lorient is still down.
Quentin Boisgard returns to the field for Lorient after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a first change, with Pierre-Yves Hamel replacing the possibly injured Quentin Boisgard.
Throw-in high up the field for Brestois in Brest.
In the minute 18, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 21, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Free kick Lorient.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 23, Lorient to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
Lorient drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Can Brestois capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
In Brest Lorient attack through Yoane Wissa. The finish is off target, however.
Karim Abed awards Brestois a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremy Le Douaron for Brestois drives towards goal at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 30, Brestois take a 1-0 lead thanks to Romain Perraud.
Julien Faussurier with an assist there.
Goal! Steve Mounie extends Brestois's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 32, Romain Perraud instrumental with a fine assist.
Christophe Herelle scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 2-1 at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
The first-half has come to a close in Brest.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Haris Belkebla with Hiang`a Mbock.
Christophe Herelle's header is off-target for Brestois.
In the minute 47, Lorient have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 53, Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Lorient, close to Brestois's area.
Laurent Abergel (Lorient) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Lorient!
In the minute 54, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lorient.
In the minute 57, Brestois are pushing forward but Romain Faivre's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
Brestois make their second substitution with Irvin Cardona replacing Romain Faivre.
In the minute 60, Adrian Grbic for Lorient gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Karim Abed awards Brestois a goal kick.
Adrian Grbic of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 60, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 62, Franck Honorat puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Brestois's Franck Honorat breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lorient.
Karim Abed signals a Brestois throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Christophe Pelissier is making the team's second substitution at Stade Francis-Le Ble with Thomas Monconduit replacing Fabien Lemoine.
Gaetan Charbonnier (Brestois) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brestois have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 68, Stephane Diarra is on a sub for Enzo Le Fee for Lorient.
In the minute 69, Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois are whistled for offside.
In the minute 72, Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Lorient defence as Franck Honorat fires in a strike for Brestois.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 73, Hiang`a Mbock (Brestois) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Brestois's Gaetan Charbonnier gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lorient defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Brest.
Brestois needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Karim Abed awards Brestois a goal kick.
Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Battocchio replacing Gaetan Charbonnier.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 79, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Brest.
Brestois needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
Franklin Wadja is replacing Laurent Abergel for the away team.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Adrian Grbic with Umut Bozok.
In Brest Lorient attack through Franklin Wadja. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lorient.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Pierre-Yves Hamel for Lorient has been booked by Karim Abed and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Play has been interrupted briefly in Brest to check on Julien Faussurier, who is grimacing with pain.
Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) has taken off Julien Faussurier who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Brendan Chardonnet is the replacement.
Free kick for Brestois in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Brestois's Irvin Cardona is on target but unsuccessful.
Karim Abed signals a Brestois throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Brestois pushes forward through Franck Honorat, whose finish on goal is saved.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Brestois drives forward and Irvin Cardona gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Karim Abed signals a Brestois throw-in in Lorient's half.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lorient.
Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-2.
Goal! Lorient reduce the deficit to 3-2 through Thomas Monconduit.
That's a fine assist from Pierre-Yves Hamel.
